Summary: Boomerang UFO big no noise no lights moving at a slow pace
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were 2 other sightings in San Jose on or around November 11th 2010
divs: Sighting Details Me and my nephew were in the back yard,it was around 7:00 - 7:30 pm it was dark already by 5:14 pm,so I was working out and joking around with my nephew having some laughs.all of a sodden he told me look! And he ran inside the house to turn off the backyard light but I thought he was trying to scare me,he came back and said what is that pointing to the sky.I looked and there it was a big boomerang UFO no lights no noise moving kinda slow at a steady pace. I didn't stop looking at with a wow.my nephew ran inside the house to tell his mom she came out with her camcorder but it was just to far by that time when we fist saw it it was almost over our head .so she came out and also saw it but we thought that it was impossible to get in on camera because it was to far by that time.by the time everything was over we were feeling like did we just see that or what ... Shocked!
